description:
To prevent the entrapment, entrainment or impingement of <<species>> at the point of abstraction specified in condition number <<xx>>, the Licence Holder shall ensure that the <<“approach velocity” or “through slot velocity”>> shall not exceed <<xx>> metres per second.
“ Approach velocity” or “through slot velocity” is the water velocity perpendicular to and 10 centimetres upstream of the screen at National grid reference <<xx >> marked <<xx>> on the map.
